detail_desc: Long-sleeved blouse in dobby-weave cotton with frill details, a small stand-up collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with smocking and a narrow frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front and deep neckline at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, double-breasted coat in a soft weave with notch lapels and front pockets. Lined.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
V-neck body in ribbed jersey with a wrapover front and ties at one side, long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs and press-studs at the crotch.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, round neckline and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, front and back pockets and straight hems.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a collar, button placket, print detail at the top and press-studs at the crotch.

Set with a smartphone case, matching headphone case and lanyard in imitation leather. Smartphone case with two card slots on the outside and a small D-ring at the base. Headphone case with a flap and carabiner hook at the top. Adjustable-length lanyard with a carabiner hook at the end.
Headband in thermal fleece. Width 8.5 cm.
Calf-length dress in a double-layered cotton weave with a crinkled texture. Round neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and gathered seams at the hips and knees for added volume.
Fabric-covered Alice bands with a large bow on the top.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Wide-fitting top with short dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Lined, non-wired, triangle bikini top with a wide hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Small imitation leather shoulder bag with fringing and small printed text on the front, a braided shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size 15x19 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, sleeveless top in a fine knit with wide shoulder straps, a sweetheart neckline and a drawstring down the front to create a draped effect.
Top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a press-stud at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length shorts in soft, washed cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Plastic hair claws. Width 3.5 cm.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Ankle-length treggings in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with a ribbed, easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the front and short raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Scalloped trim around the neckline and down the button band.
Elasticated chokers with no fasteners.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin.
Coin-shaped earrings in embossed metal with large, pearly plastic beads. Length 5 cm.
Jersey playsuit with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Double-layered hats in cotton jersey. One patterned.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short metal chain necklace with metal skeleton hands at the front. Adjustable length 32-40 cm.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with embroidery, a V-neck and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Side support, a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Beaded, flounced T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with sequins on the front, a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a deep neckline at the front and a broderie anglaise frill around the armholes. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
Short skirt in a cotton weave. High waist with wide smocking and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Fine-knit trainers with an elasticated top edge and grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh insoles.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Top in stretch, sequined mesh with a draped polo neck with a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Shorts in woven fabric. High paper bag waist with covered elastication.
Cheeky briefs in microfibre and lace with a lined gusset, laser-cut edges at the front and a high cut at the back.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a glittery, lightly padded edge at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front, press-studs at the back of one shoulder and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Briefs in ribbed jersey with a mid waist, wide elastic waistband, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.

Short jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets with a press-stud, and a drawstring hem. Jersey lining.
Short, double-breasted coat in a soft weave with notch lapels and front pockets. Lined.

V-neck kimono blouse in satin with a crêpe finish. Smocking with a drawstring at the waist, a double-breasted press-stud fastening at the front, dropped shoulders, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with decorative buttons at the neckline, buttons at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a square neckline front and back and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Fabric belt with leather details and a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Narrow Alice bands in shimmering plastic with cat ears on top.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and cut-off fringing at the sleeve-ends and hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Knee-length dress in a patterned weave with a concealed zip at the top and long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Long dress in airy chiffon containing glittery threads with a round neck, concealed buttons down the front and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the shoulders. High slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.
Thin metal hoop earrings with a shell pendant. Diameter approx. 3 cm.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin. Size 80x80 cm.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a cut-out section at the back and long sleeves. Unlined.
3/4-length trousers in soft jersey made from a viscose and linen blend with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist and straight, wide legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an appliqué on the front.
